import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Register.css'; const Register = () => { const [user,setUser] = useState({ companyName:"",email:"",phone:"",password:"",cpassword:"" }) const handleInputs = () => { let namee = e.target.name; let value = e.target.value setUser({...user,[namee]:value}) } return (

); } export default Register;
